025package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.priority;
026
027import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
028
029import java.util.Comparator;
030
031/**
032 * An interface to set the listener's priority.
033 * <p>
034 * {@link Priority} is used to determine the order of listener calls.
035 * <p>
036 * {@link Priority} is compared by {@link Integer#compare(int, int)}.
037 * The smaller value, the listener is called earlier; the larger value, it is called later.
038 * For the same value, it is not defined which is called first.
039 */
040public record Priority(int value) {
041
042    /**
043     * A {@link Comparator} to compare two {@link Priority}.
044     */
045    public static final Comparator<Priority> COMPARATOR = Comparator.comparingInt(Priority::value);
046
047    /**
048     * Priority value: -64
049     */
050    public static final Priority LOW = new Priority(-128);
051
052    /**
053     * Priority value: 0
054     */
055    public static final Priority NORMAL = new Priority(0);
056
057    /**
058     * Priority value: 64
059     */
060    public static final Priority HIGH = new Priority(128);
061
062    /**
063     * Creates a new priority.
064     *
065     * @param value the priority value
066     * @return the priority
067     */
068    public static @NotNull Priority value(int value) {
069        return switch (value) {
070            case -128 ->  LOW;
071            case 0 -> NORMAL;
072            case 128 -> HIGH;
073            default -> new Priority(value);
074        };
075    }
076}
